CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Locafy Ltd is focused on commercializing its Software as a Service (SaaS) online publishing technology platform. Its platform enables the ability to publish almost any type of content to almost any device that uses a web browser to display web content. The firm has three operating segments: the Publishing segment, the Direct sale segment, and the Channel sales segment.

value.name: Gavin Burnett
value.title: Chief Executive Officer, Executive Director & MD
